title: Vegan Cook Ivern
body:
The passive makes a "ding" sound when a camp is ready to be fr(i/e)ed.

no more words needed{{champion:427}}

replies.body:
Little known information: In most cases, if you find a /de in a url, you`d need to write german in there. Alternatively, you can read any of the last 50 Threads and recognise that they are german... Well anyways
---
You`ve made a really great concept art. I literally see the skin ingame. The artwork you provided really helps undermine your ideas.
---
I really like how you described all abilities and how they`d have to look. I mean, not everyone has great imagination, so the explanation really helps to nail your point home.

MfG Sirius00
